resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105732</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105732</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085954</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Celebrating the freedom to read</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiern der Freiheit, um zu lesen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Célébration de la liberté pour lire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comemorando a liberdade para ler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Celebrazione della libertà per leggere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εορτασμός της ελευθερίας να διαβάσει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Celebración de la libertad para leer</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Banned Books Week teaches the importance of our First Amendment rights and draws attention to the danger of restricting information in a free society.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbotene Buch-Woche unterrichtet den Wert 
unserer erste Änderung Rechte und lenkt Aufmerksamkeit auf die Gefahr
der einschränkenden Informationen in einer freien Gesellschaft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La semaine interdite de livres enseigne 
l'importance de nos droites de premier amendement et appelle 
l'attention sur le danger d'information limitrice dans une société 
libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A semana proibida dos livros ensina a 
importância de nossas direitas da primeira emenda e desenha a 
atenção ao perigo da informação de restrição em uma sociedade 
livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La settimana vietata dei libri insegna 
l'importanza dei nostri diritti di prima correzione ed attira 
l'attenzione sul pericolo delle informazioni di limitazione in una 
società libera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απαγορευμένη εβδομάδα βιβλίων διδάσκει τη σημασία 
των πρώτων δικαιωμάτων τροποποιήσεών μας και εφιστά την προσοχή 
στον κίνδυνο τις πληροφορίες σε μια ελεύθερη κοινωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La semana prohibida de los libros enseña la 
importancia de las nuestras derechas de primera enmienda y traza la 
atención al peligro de la información de restricción en una 
sociedad libre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085954</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105732</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/celebrating-the-freedom-to-read</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
